div.bibl: Miscellaneous Material Owned by Dr. H. R. Krasnow, 4601 N.Broadway, Chicago. Announcements of lectures by Cultural-Enlightenment Society "Zarya".

body.p: In a circular, the Cultural Enlightenment Society "Zarya" announced lectures on the philosophy of Bernard Shaw and other subjects.
These lectures were given on January 1917 at the "Grusenberg Progressive School", 1208 N.Hoyne. They were free.
